summary: Test suite for the mixed‑precision (AMP) plugin in PyTorch Lightning, covering distributed (DDP) training, gradient un‑scaling, parameter validation, optimizer skipping, and CPU‑only contexts, with helper utilities for clipping and a mock precision model.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the AMP plugin across different training configurations to prevent regressions and ensure reliable mixed‑precision behavior in production models.
